org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.util

Class BooleanMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.util.BooleanMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColorMap<Double>

    public final class BooleanMap
extends Object
implements ColorMap<Double>
    Class BooleanMap defines an implementation of the ColorMap interface which maps values to colors based on whether or not the values pass a boolean comparison.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BooleanMap.BooleanType
      Enumerable BooleanType defines the type of boolean comparison that is to be performed by the scale.

        public BooleanMap(BooleanType type, double comparisonValue)

        Defines a ColorScale which maps values to colors based on a boolean comparison.
        Parameters:
        type - - The type of boolean comparison to perform.
        comparisonValue - - The value against which the comparison should be made.

      • BooleanMap

        public BooleanMap(BooleanMap.BooleanType type,
                  double comparisonValue,
                  Color activeColor)
        BooleanMap

        public BooleanMap(BooleanType type, double comparisonValue, Color activeColor)

        Defines a ColorScale which maps values to colors based on a boolean comparison.
        Parameters:
        type - - The type of boolean comparison to perform.
        comparisonValue - - The value against which the comparison should be made.
        activeColor - - The color in which values that pass the comparison should be displayed.

      • BooleanMap

        public BooleanMap(BooleanType type, double comparisonValue, Color activeColor, Color inactiveColor)

        Defines a ColorScale which maps values to colors based on a boolean comparison.
        Parameters:
        type - - The type of boolean comparison to perform.
        comparisonValue - - The value against which the comparison should be made.
        activeColor - - The color in which values that pass the comparison should be displayed.
        inactiveColor - - The color in which values that fail the comparison should be displayed.

      • passes

        private boolean passes(double d)
        passes

        private boolean passes(double d)

        Determines whether a given external value passes the boolean check or not.
        Parameters:
        d - - The external value to compare.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the value passes the boolean check and false if it does not.
